name: ai-resume-template
description: AI-powered resume website template with chatbot and job fit assessment

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: npm run validate && concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: npm run validate && cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build

author: Your Name
